long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 20 Second Rule Chrome Extension is a simple productivity tool that enables you to make distracting sites 20 seconds harder to get to.  It is based upon the 20 Second Rule in The Happiness Advantage by Shawn Anchor.
